data.text: We’re back.

I feel like I’m in a war zone in Beit El. Israeli keeps just went full forces with hundreds of teargas canisters shot. There are undercover Israeli police also came in a civilian car and tried to kidnap youth. #SaveSheikhJarrah

One Palestinian inured in the thigh in #Nablus from Israeli soldiers, #Jerusalem is dealing with al sorts of injuries from brutality of Israeli soldiers, in #Ramallah PA thugs have been trying to demoralize protestors but youth are heading towards Beit El settlement. So tense.

Palestinian leaders and representatives are loyal to their factions, not Palestinian rights. The identification of Palestinians as one from Haifa to Nablus to Gaza to Tarsheeha is testament to our rejection of all that divides us. #SaveSheikhJarrah

data.text: “This is Zionist settler colonialism, where if one settler does not take our homes, another settler will..We do not need more empty both sides-isms, we need solidarity to overcome apartheid” @4noura & I came together for this piece on what’s happening home https://t.co/vkVINfvLdE
RT @LinahAlsaafin: 🚨 Gaza Ministry of Health: number of Palestinians killed now up to 20, including nine children. 65 others others wounded…
Remember how Israel wanted to deny that @hrw report noting Israel practices apartheid and persecution? Today alone #Israel military killed four children in #Gaza. #Palestine
RT @Thamina_F: Israeli planes have bombed Gaza, killing civilians in the street including 4 children. The videos & photographs are too horr…

It disgusts me how there are people, including organizations and politicians, that are actually blaming #Gaza for the killing of 3 children by Israeli warplanes. 

No one directed that target point except Israel’s military. #SaveSheikhJarrah

Gaza, has been under siege for 14 years.

If any of you can live that life, by all means switch places with someone in #Gaza instead of political analysis and criminalizing their pain. 

#SaveSheikhJarrah #SavePalestine

The photos from #Gaza are horrifying. The bodies of the children on the hospital bed, bloodied and so small. I will not share them, these lives are so much more than images prodding the world to hold Israel accountable. #Palestine #SaveSheikhJarrah

data.text:
Israeli warplanes just killed three Palestinian children in #Gaza. 
Israeli settlers trying to evict families in Sheikh Jarrah, then Israeli army firing live ammunition, teargas, and beating up worshippers in Aqsa, and now Israeli military killed 3 children. #SavePalestine

Three rockets fired towards #Jerusalem. Reports that Iron Dome intercepted 7. Sirens are reported in #Jerusalem and elsewhere, yet Israeli police/rangers are now still beating up youth near Damascus Gate in #Jerusalem and attacking on their horses. #SaveSheikhJarrah
Three rockets fired from #Gaza towards #Jerusalem. One landed near Abu Ghosh. https://t.co/WQzwcwB2JN
RT @dianabuttu: Happening now in Al Aqsa. Tear gas being sprayed choking Palestinians. https://t.co/guzz5zkZRr
Three rockets were fired just now by Hamas from #Gaza . You can hear them from #Ramallah to #Jerusalem.

From the protests near the settlement of Beit El last night. Palestinians are saying it feels like a war zone.

But this isn’t a feeling or a metaphor. What else is it when an army is cracking down on unarmed protestors with live fire, or teargas at head level? #SaveSheikhJarrah https://t.co/xL7NlHM6iJ

This was from an interview in 2018. It’s 2021, with a pandemic that has engulfed the world in flames, and settlers are still taking lands and lives. We are tired, this time listen differently than years that passed. Change needs us to change our ways too. #SaveSheikhJarrah https://t.co/EkUwQSckbT

data.text: Does #America understand that when Palestinians say cut aid to Israel they’re saying invest in yourself instead? Most US aid to Israel is military assistance. Less militaries more in education & health. Almost 3.8 billion was given in 2019 alone. Imagine what you can do with that

Start the process to cut aid, take the money, invest it in American schools, in a curricula that does not whitewash history, one which empowers youth instead of marginalized them based on colorlines. Helping Palestinians is really helping yourselves. #SaveSheikhJarrah https://t.co/UQfFPIS7k1

#SaveSheikhJarrah

Palestinians in #Jerusalem preparing food for breaking the fast as today is the holiest day of Ramadan. Israeli police had stopped buses of Palestinians who came to support #Jerusalem from northern cities like Yaffa and Haifa. Their laughter is everything. #SaveSheikhJarrah https://t.co/tz7TzOkiu5
